Projects

Long-form series and ongoing creative endeavors

Dusk Final Hunt Command Cadre

Remnants of the Nyss hunters walk a razors edge between vengeance and survival. Led by Lanyssa Ryssyl, the Final Hunt fights with cold precision and striking speed, carving through the snow-bitten wilds in service to Dusk.

2 posts

Trench Pilgrims

A grim pilgrimage through the mud and mire. Follow along as I build and paint my Trench Pilgrims warband.

6 posts

Motley Crews

Building warbands and terrain for Motley Crews skirmish games.

6 posts

Orcs and Goblins Army

Building and painting a classic Orcs and Goblins army for Warhammer The Old World.

12 posts
